## View all Datasets
Use the gallery application to view all datasets, search datasets by name, open the dataset landing page, and view the dataset in ArcGIS Map Viewer. 

<video width="640" height="400" controls>
  <source src="video/searchapp_screencapture.webm" type= "video/webm">
  Your browser does not support the video tag. 
  
</video>

## Use the Interactive Mapper
Use the interactive mapping application to view NOAA NEFSC data alongside BOEM marine development data. Toggle data layers on and off, view the map legend, and click on the map for more information on map features.

<video width="640" height="400" controls>
  <source src="video/mapper_screencapture.webm" type= "video/webm">

</video>
